data.title: Capital I Industries Inc. â€“ Setting the standard in road maintenance equipment
data.text:
Life is a Highway Back Road Capital I has the Solution to your gravel roads and

ditch needs. Whether you want smooth roadways

or grass control, we have the attachment for you! CONTACT US

Gravel Reclaimer/Sloper

Patented postless Design offers excellent operator visibility and allows the reclaimer to extend.

Road Groomer

Cut washboard, ice and removes rock from the road top with the Capital I Road Groomer.

Wing Mounted Mower

Loose link mounting assembly allows mower to float over obstacles and approaches with a 10 mph mowing speed.

Capital I Industries Inc. is a family owned rural Saskatchewan manufacturing company that started operations in 1991.

We have many combined years experience in the road building, maintenance, mechanical, fabricating and manufacturing industries.

Through this experience we have manufactured the following:

GRADER MOUNT SOD MULCHER

PULL-TYPE SOD MULCHER

GRADER MOUNT ONE WAY SNOW PLOW

GRADER MOUNT GRAVEL RECLAIMER

GRADER MOUNT ROAD GROOMER

GRADER MOUNT POST-LESS SNOW WINGS

GRADER MOUNT BRUSH AND GRASS MOWER

GRADER MOUNT U-V DOZER

Capital I Industries Inc. Location

CAPITAL I INDUSTRIES INC.

Manufacturing in Rural

Saskatchewan Since 1991
